FKE Seminar Series – Assoc. Prof. Dr. Waleed Ejaz
=================================================

by [shahidatulsadiah](https://fke.utm.my/author/shahidatulsadiah/ "Posts by shahidatulsadiah")
 | Sep 5, 2024 | [FKESeminarSeries](https://fke.utm.my/category/fkeseminarseries/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/WhatsApp-Image-2024-09-05-at-10.28.49-AM-980x735.jpeg)

Assalammualaikum Wrm Wbt / Warm Greetings,

All academic staff and students are cordially invited to attend a workshop organized by the FKE, which is scheduled as follows:

Speaker : Assoc. Prof. Dr. Waleed Ejaz  
Title : Use of AI In Teaching  
Date : 12 September 2024 (Thursday)  
Time : 9.00 AM – 4.30 PM  
Venue : Smart Classroom, Level 3, Block P02-308, Faculty of Electrical Engineering

We are looking forward to your participation.  
(CPD hour is awarded for staff, postgraduate students’ attendance will be recorded to fulfill the faculty’s requirement)

Thank you.
